name: Heart of Gold: Flames of the Butterfly
name_original: Heart of Gold: Flames of the Butterfly
description:
It is a fine day in Silverston, but you are just a child.

This is the origin story of Hayes Brighton, the protagonist of a passion project I'm currently working on. Experience the day that changes his life forever.

This is a test-based adventure with multiple endings. It is small, but most endings have slight variations depending on how what choices you took to get there. I hope you enjoy it as much as I did writing it!
